name: DIVINITY
description:
A strange visitor in a family.
Since they've come, none of them can continue living as they did.
Who was that visitor?
Could they be divine?

A strange visitor.

In DIVINITY, you play as a strange visitor in a family. Your mysterious appearance has ignited desires in each of the family members. With your divine gifts, you can help them to achieve their desires and reach divinity.

Infatuate family members.

Spend time with family members as they engage in activities throughout the estate, and see how they display their feelings towards you. Day & night cycles, randomized events and guests keep the estate interesting.

Divine sight.

Use your divine sight to find the most infatuated family member. This will also show how close you are to revealing their desires.

Manipulate time.

Use your powers to speed up time and see how their infatuation with you changes.

Fulfil their desires.

Each family member has a desire, which is a puzzle that you must successfully solve for them to be a step closer to reaching divinity.


This game is based upon the 1968 film Theorem
